io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.bound

Class Bound

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.engine.param.Parametric
      • io.smudgr.engine.SmudgeComponent
        • io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.AlgorithmComponent
          • io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.bound.Bound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectItem, ReflectableType
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EllipticalBound

    public class Bound
extends AlgorithmComponent
    The Bound class is an AlgorithmComponent that defines behavior for restricting the focus of an Algorithm to a parameterized rectangle.

    Bound instances run before any other AlgorithmComponent in the chain, so setting a small bound area may improve Algorithm performance on high resolution images.

      • getTypeName

        public java.lang.String getTypeName()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        The user identifiable name of this implementation.

        This name can safely be changed between versions of the application, and may be used for translations.

        Implementations of this implementation should not override this method.

        Returns:
        String that will identify this implementation to the user.
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryName(), ReflectableType.getTypeIdentifier()

      • getTypeIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getTypeIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: ReflectableType
        This should return a unique identifier of this type implementation.

        The name that this type implementation is identified to the user with may differ from this identifier. This concept is similar to a 'slug'.

        Implementations of a type should use this method to distinguish themselves.

        The String returned by this method should be changed between versions.

        Specified by:
        getTypeIdentifier in interface ReflectableType
        Overrides:
        getTypeIdentifier in class AlgorithmComponent
        Returns:
        String that will enumerate this implementation across versions of the application
        See Also:
        ReflectableType.getTypeCategoryIdentifier(), ReflectableType.getTypeName()

        public boolean containsPoint(int x,
                             int y,
                             int w,
                             int h)
        Checks whether a given point is contained within the current state of this Bound, given PixelFrame dimensions
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate to test
        y - coordinate to test
        w - width of PixelFrame
        h - height of PixelFrame
        Returns:
        true if this Bound contains the given point, false if otherwise
